summary.Title: Application Software Engineer
summary.Presentation: Do you want to create a future where internet connectivity knows no boundaries? Then join our client CobhamSATCOM on their fantastic transformatio

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you want to create a future where internet connectivity knows no boundaries? Then join our client CobhamSATCOM on their fantastic transformational journey to help keep people safe and connected in the remotest areas of the world!

 

Requirements:

  • An educational background within Software, Bachelor's or Master's level, but other educational backgrounds combined with SW experience will also be considered.
  • Experience with complex SW environments, system development of large distributed systems and algorithms. It is important that you want and can work with complex SW algorithms - for example, concerning system load handling. You must be able to maintain an overview of such systems and you must have the skillset to systematically debug them.
  • You must be well familiarized with the C++ (prefereably 14/17) programming language.
  • You must have a well-grown sense of quality in all working relations – Cobham’s solution needs to be working well once released into an operational environment.
  • You have knowledge of communication protocols used in the telecommunication sector.
  • Experienced in a Linux development environment.

 

Key responsibilities:

  • Design, re-design and development of new software applications and associated algorithms for use in satellite communication networks based on user requirements in existing and new product development projects
  • Analysing user requirements and design algorithms and applications to meet such requirements.
  • System design and detailed design of software applications/algorithms including interactions between such software components.
  • Extension and re-design of existing procedures/implementations, code restructuring to fit added requirements and to ease maintenance.
  • Coding, integration, test and switch into operation of SW - debugging of the algorithms in an on-air operational environment.
  • Test automation, designing and scripting automated tests.
  • For experienced candidates and Team Lead aspirants, overseeing a team of both internal and external staff implementing applications and algorithms.
  • Maintenance, debugging, and bug-fixing of developed SW
  • Tools: Git, Jenkins, GCC, C/C++, Make, General Open Source, Jira, Wireshark and Enterprise Architect.

 

We offer:

  • 15.000 – 24.000 PLN net/month
  • Stable, permanent employment based on your choice (UoP/B2B)
  • Remote hybrid option – we’d love to see you a few times a month
  • Personal development budget
  • Insurance
  • Stay-on bonus
  • Central and modern office space in Kraków
  • Onboarding trip to Copenhagen
  • Flat management structure following a Scandinavian work culture
  • Which other benefits are important to you? Let us know!

Referral bonus: 5,000 PLN if we sign an engineer based on your recommendation.

Interested?
Apply here. 

If you have any questions about the position or Cobham, please get in touch with Tommy Both Juul on tbj@mpeople.dk or +45 25 64 28 28.

We look forward to hearing from you.

#jobsforukraine
